cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: This is a female only dorm! Spacious 6 bed dorm room with 3 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power point. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 bed mixed dorm room with 3 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power point. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: One bed in a 4 bed dorm room with 2 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power point. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private queen room with high quality queen bed, 50in LED TV, wardrobe and study desk. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Whole 3 bed dorm room - room consists of 1x set of bunks + 1x single bed. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Spacious private queen room with high quality queen bed, 50in LED TV, fast wireless phone & watch charger, wardrobe, bar fridge, tea + coffee, and sweeping views of the Melbourne city skyline. Clean and modern ensuite bathroom located in the room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private family room with 1 high quality queen bed and 1 bunk bed, 32 inch LED TV, wardrobe and study desk. Clean and modern ensuite bathroom located in the room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
